p: We evaluated antimicrobial activities of SEO against bacteria ( Escherichia coli, Pseudomonas aeruginosa and Staphylococcus aureus) and fungi ( Saccharomyces cerevisiae and Candida albicans) by MIC and minimum bactericidal concentration (MBC). Tetracycline hydrochloride was used as positive control against bacteria, and miconazole nitrate was used as positive control against fungi.
